text:
California drivers who buy electric cars overwhelmingly fit a narrow demographic profile: male, white or Asian American, between 30 and 49. Most earn more than $100,000 a year. 

That's a problem for Newsom's goal to ban the sale of gas-powered cars. https://t.co/eWS9GyBd92 https://t.co/6xz1HkPaJL

name: sfchronicle
text:
The Chronicle’s analysis of data on electric car buyers shows the stark disparities:
▪️68% of buyers were men.
▪️Only 5% were Hispanic/Latino; fewer than 2% were Black
▪️72% of buyers reported a household income above $100,000.
https://t.co/005iGlsUKH
